name: Python Font Downloader PyFD
short_description: Cross platform Font downloader for Xerox/Tektronix/HP printers.PyFD allows the user to send PCL and Postscript Fonts on multiple printers.It is based on multiple socket connnection using TCP ports 9100, 2501 and 2000.Its GUI was created using WxPython.
